code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BuyerDashboard(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const fetch=async()=>{const resp=await api.get('/api/products');setProducts(resp.data||[]);};useEffect(()=>{fetch();},[]);const buy=async id=>{await api.post('/api/orders',{productId:id,quantity:1});alert('Order placed');fetch();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-semibold",children:"Browse Products"}),products.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card mt-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:p.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Price: ",p.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"px-2 py-1 bg-green-600 text-white rounded",onClick:()=>buy(p._id),children:"Buy 1"})})]})},p._id))]});}
